interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Last of the Summer Wine: Vintage 1976 (Season 3) (DVD)
Review Date: 2013/10/23
Store: Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, BBC, All BBC Titles
Product Description: ['Last of the Summer Wine: Vintage 1976 (Season 3) (DVD)', 'The picturesque Pennine village of Holmfirth in the Yorkshire Dales is the setting for this vintage comedy, which first began life in 1973. This is Brontë country miles and miles of unspoilt moorland and a breath-taking backdrop to the antics of our ageing delinquents and their demented friends. Last of the Summer Wine has a strong ensemble cast of characters, though there has always been a central trio.', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Various', 'Language': 'Unqualified, English (Mono)', 'Runtime': '3 hours and 26 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3707458', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '3 hours and 26 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 11, 2008', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'BBC Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I am almost afraid to rate this series five star. The American market limits the availability of this series hence the higher prices and low availability . I am collecting these and don't t want the competition.
Review Title: Stick with your American "drag ". Let the media manipulate your preferences.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Last of the Summer Wine: Vintage 1985
Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Comedy
['"The world’s longest-running sitcom is back with more adventures from everyone’s favorite geriatrics! The year is 1985. Among many other things, Compo, Clegg and Foggy attempt to settle a question involving Nora Battys feet, an old mattress dumped in the countryside prompts Foggy to institute the Dewhirst Campaign for a Cleaner Countryside, and with the assistance of Comp & Clegg, Foggy sets out to show Digby’s donkey who\'s the boss. "']
{'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Various', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '4 hours and 59 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '5957799', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '4 hours and 59 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 7, 2010', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Studio': 'BBC Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Clean intelligent humor. I am so tired of during on the television to see and hear the subject matter that dominates the entertainment airwaves....sexually explicit themes, violence to the point of special effects to " shock" the already jaded mind, and other trash. The " Last of the Summer Wine" is one of the clearest funniest, most simply creative shows I have ever seen. Leave it to the English!
CLEAN intelligent comedy. Not for many.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Preferred Genre:** Comedy, focusing on light-hearted and intelligent humor.
- **Content Taste:** Strong preference for clean, non-explicit themes; dislikes sexual themes, excessive violence, and mainstream trends prioritizing shock value.
- **Cultural Appreciation:** Values British humor and storytelling, with a significant affection for classic television series that evoke nostalgia and charm, particularly those from the BBC.
- **Critical Approach:** Discernible consumer who rates content highly (e.g., 5.0 ratings), providing critical commentary on contemporary entertainment standards. Shows a clear disdain for low-quality content.
- **Format Preference:** Enjoys collecting physical media, particularly DVDs, and has a tendency to prefer boxed sets, demonstrating a desire for ownership over streaming options.
- **Recent Engagement:** Recently expressed enthusiasm for a vintage British comedy series, indicating a consistent appreciation for clean, intellectual humor as a refreshing alternative to explicit contemporary offerings while actively collecting related media.

The user’s latest purchase reflects a commitment to building a nostalgic collection of classic British comedies, while also emphasizing their frustration with limited availability in the American market, which heightens their determination to secure these assets. Overall, the user maintains a clear inclination towards wholesome entertainment that contrasts sharply with current media trends.
